#include<stdio.h>

int main()
{
    long long int t, n,c ;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%lld",&n);
              c=0;
              if(n%2==1)
              printf("BMEENA\n");
              else
              {
                  while(n!=1)
                  {
                             n=n/2;
                             if(n==1)
                             break;
                             if(n%2==1)
                             { c=1; break;}
                             }
                  if(c==0)
                  printf("BKUL\n");
                  else
                  printf("BMEENA\n");
                  }
              }
              return 0;
    }
